title: Asthma Management Protocol
content: Asthma management follows a stepped approach based on symptom control and exacerbation risk. Treatment includes controller medications (inhaled corticosteroids, LABA, LTRA) and rescue medications (SABA). Patient education, trigger avoidance, and asthma action plans are essential components. Treatment is adjusted periodically based on symptom control, with the goal of using the lowest effective medication dosage.
